alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 6:31AM PST until February 27 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Central Oregon Coast. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow should generally be restricted to elevations above 500 feet. However, occasional heavier showers may bring brief snow accumulations down to sea level from time to time.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
